summary: At the age of 55, a Hindu man discovers that he was born Muslim and adopted by a Hindu family.
cast: Naseeruddin Shah|Paresh Rawal|Annu Kapoor|Auritra Ghosh|Gippy Grewal|Alka Badola Kaushal|Hazel Keech|Rushita Pandya|Jagdish Rajpurohit|Nitesh V. Ranglani|Manoj Raghubir Sharma|Prachi Sharma|Asif Silavat|Sharat Sonu|Abudhar Al Hassan
title: Dharam Sankat Mein
